{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Towers of Betrayal|A|The Towers of Betrayal are a}} series of huge obelisks found throughout [[Sumeru]]'s [[Great Red Sand]].</p><p>The ones in [[Hypostyle Desert]], [[Land of Lower Setekh]], and [[Land of Upper Setekh]] are on the surface, but must be unlocked from within by accessing them through the desert's cave network. The ones in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]] are partially or completely buried underground, and are entered through their main entrance. They all feature a ground level room with a blue crystal, and some feature a basement area accessed using an elevator.</p>}}

The obelisks in the Hypostyle Desert, Land of Lower Setekh, and Land of Upper Setekh can be re-activated, and are associated with the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[The Three Obelisks of Necrovalley]]''.

==Specifics==
* [[Land of Lower Setekh]] (south of [[Abdju Pit]])
** Accessed from within, from the Abdju Road: Upper Ruin underground zone.
** Basement contains a particle-collecting [[Time Trial Challenge]] featuring invisible platforms.
** Requires [[Clearance]] level 1 to activate the crystal, open the main entrance and revitalize the oasis in front.
* [[Land of Upper Setekh]] (west of [[Valley of Dahri]])
** Accessed from within, from the Thutmose's Secret Base underground zone.
** Basement contains a particle-collecting Time Trial Challenge featuring invisible platforms and [[Four-Leaf Sigil]]s.
** Requires Clearance level 1{{verify}} to activate the crystal, open the main entrance and revitalize the oasis in front.
* [[Hypostyle Desert]] (northwest of [[The Mausoleum of King Deshret]])
** Accessed from within, from The Mausoleum of King Deshret Northwest: Rock Cavern Upper Level underground zone.
** Basement contains a particle-collecting Time Trial Challenge featuring a maze of invisible platforms.
** Requires Clearance level 1 to activate the crystal, open the main entrance and revitalize the oasis in front.
* [[Desert of Hadramaveth]] (northwest of [[Khaj-Nisut]])
** Has no accessible basement.
* Desert of Hadramaveth (northwest of [[Safhe Shatranj]])
** Basement contains a complex [[Cascade Pool]] puzzle and the [[Records of the Ancient Oases#Records of the Ancient Oases: Part II|Records of the Ancient Oases: Part II]] interactable.
* Desert of Hadramaveth (in [[Debris of Panjvahe]])
** Entrance level contains a [[Verity Cell]] puzzle involving [[Ruins Torch]]es, and the [[Records of the Ancient Oases#Records of the Ancient Oases: Part VII|Records of the Ancient Oases: Part VII]] interactable.
** Basement contains a [[Ruin Grader]].
* Desert of Hadramaveth (in [[Wadi Al-Majuj]])
** Contains nothing of note, but acts as the setting of a combat scene during the World Quest ''[[For Her Judgment Reaches to the Skies...]]''
** Does not trigger the special soundtracks used in the other Towers of Betrayal.

==Lore==
Multiple Towers of Betrayal are seen in the [https://youtu.be/EEGh9J0TH2E ''Lost Legacies in the Sand'' cutscene] narrated by the priest [[Kasala]] in the {{Quest|Secret of the Scorching Desert}}. He refers to the Towers as temples that where built by [[King Deshret]]'s priests and infused by [[Greater Lord Rukkhadevata]]'s power of life in order to tamper the disasters brought by King Deshret's [[Forbidden Knowledge]]. Kasala used to guard one such temple.
